DOC.brief_summary: Mathematica award contract ACF conduct evaluation select grantee offer Healthy Marriage Relationship Education Programs.This particular evaluation focus University Denver 's MotherWise program , offer relationship education support low-income woman expect baby . The program three core component : ( 1 ) 18 hour core workshop session use Within My Reach relationship education curriculum supplement content mother-infant relationship ; ( 2 ) case management service ; ( 3 ) optional relationship education workshops couple . The evaluation test effect full package service mother ' relationship outcome , well outcomes related child well-being , co-parenting father involvement .
DOC.detailed_description: The U.S. Department Health Human Services ( HHS ) , Administration Children Families ( ACF ) , conduct evaluation healthy marriage relationship education ( HMRE ) program . Mathematica award contract ACF conduct evaluation select programs/grantees.This segment large evaluation focus University Denver 's MotherWise program . The Mother Wise program offer relationship education support low-income woman expect baby . The program three core component : ( 1 ) 18 hour core workshop session use Within My Reach relationship education curriculum supplement content mother-infant relationship ; ( 2 ) case management service ; ( 3 ) optional relationship education workshops couple . The evaluation test effect full package service mother ' relationship outcome , well outcomes related child well-being , co-parenting father involvement . If feasible , evaluation also examine measure available hospital record , birth weight . Mother Wise enroll woman expect baby receive prenatal care service Denver Health hospital system . Women recruit evaluation primarily clinic receive prenatal service . Control group member eligible Mother Wise eligible service available community . To document outcome study participant , survey data collect two time point : ( 1 ) baseline survey administer study enrollment ( 2 ) follow-up survey conduct year later . Surveys conduct staff Mathematica 's Survey Operations Center use computer-assisted telephone interviewing ( CATI ) . Survey data may supplement administrative record data Denver Health system .
DOC.criteria: To eligible , woman must : 1. expect baby 2. age 18 old 3. able speak Spanish English 4. nonincarcerated .
